title: Copy List with Random Pointer
content:
A linked list is given such that each node contains an additional random pointer which could point to any node in the list or null.
Return a deep copy of the list.
The Linked List is represented in the input/output as a list of  nodes. Each node is represented as a pair of  where:

: an integer representing 
: the index of the node (range from 0 to ) where random pointer points to, or  if it does not point to any node.

 











 



 is null or pointing to a node in the linked list.
The number of nodes will not exceed 1000.
